Package net.emuman.spigotutils.items

Class ItemStackBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.emuman.spigotutils.ItemStackBuilder
  • public class ItemStackBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for ItemStack that allows for repeated calls and the ability to easily assign ItemMeta attributes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ItemStackBuilder​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Creates a new ItemStackBuilder.
      ItemStackBuilder​(org.bukkit.Material material)
      Creates a new ItemStackBuilder.

        public ItemStackBuilder addEnchant​(org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment enchantment,
                                   int level,
                                   boolean ignoreLevelRestriction)
        Parameters:
        enchantment - the enchantment to apply to the ItemStack.
        level - the level of the enchantment to apply.
        ignoreLevelRestriction - true if the enchantment level should ignore the level restriction, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        this same instance for repeated calls.

        Parameters:

      • newLeatherArmor

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack newLeatherArmor​(org.bukkit.Material armorType,
                                                             org.bukkit.Color color)
        Creates new leather armor with the specified color, contained within a single method.
        Parameters:
        armorType - the armor piece to use (must be a leather armor piece)
        color - the color of the new armor.
        Returns:
        the ItemStack with the new colored armor, false if armorType was invalid.
